text: The Tanzania women's national under 17 football team represents Tanzania in international women's under 17 football. They have qualified for the FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup for the first time in 2022 and being the first Tanzanian football team to be the World Cup in any gender. Category:African women's national association football teams Category:National under-17 football teams Category:Football in Tanzania Category:National sports teams of Tanzania
title: Tanzania women's national under-17 football team
